title: ASP.NET Core 2.1.0-preview1: Introducing compatibility version in MVC
description: This post was written by Ryan Nowak In 2.1 we're adding a feature to address a long-standing problem for maintaining MVC - how do we make improvements to framework code without making it too hard for developers to upgrade to the latest version?

title: Testing ASP.NET Core MVC web apps in-memory
description: This post was written and submitted by Javier Calvarro Nelson, a developer on the ASP.NET Core MVC team Testing is an important part of the development process of any application.

title: ASP.NET MVC 5.2.3, Web Pages 3.2.3 and Web API 5.2.3 Release
description: It's been about two months since we released the first beta of ASP.NET 5, and today we happy to announce that ASP.NET 5 Beta2 is available.
